title: linguistics MCQs for English Lecturer Test | FPSC TEST PREPARATION | Noam Chomsky
description:
This video is about linguistics MCQs for English lecturership test.Kppsc and FPSc test.
__________ is term introduced by CHOMSKY to describe ‘the actual use of language in concrete situations’
A. Performance

The system of communication within a community.
A. Langue

A pair of terms introduced by Noam CHOMSKY in 1965 to describe native speakers’ intuitions about the grammatical correctness, or otherwise, of sentences.
C. Acceptable/Unacceptable

The study of language and mind, which has greatly advanced our understanding of the way in which we acquire language is_________?
B. Psycholinguisctics
